report_fields.sqlQuery:
SELECT 'triage',COUNT(e.encounter_id)
FROM encounter e
         INNER JOIN encounter_type et ON e.encounter_type = et.encounter_type_id
WHERE et.uuid = '67a71486-1a54-468f-ac3e-7091a9a79584'
  AND e.encounter_datetime >= ':startDate'
  AND e.encounter_datetime <= ':endDate'
AND e.voided = 0;

SELECT 'clinician', COUNT(e.encounter_id)
FROM encounter e
         INNER JOIN encounter_type et ON e.encounter_type = et.encounter_type_id
WHERE et.uuid IN ('8d5b27bc-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f', '8d5b2be0-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f',
                  '334bf97e-28e2-4a27-8727-a5ce31c7cd66', '334bf97e-28e2-4a27-8727-a5ce31c7cd66')
  AND e.encounter_datetime >= ':startDate'
  AND e.encounter_datetime <= ':endDate'
  AND e.voided = 0;

SELECT 'pharmacy', COUNT(e.encounter_id)
FROM encounter e
         INNER JOIN encounter_type et ON e.encounter_type = et.encounter_type_id
WHERE et.uuid IN ('dbe038cd-cad5-439d-a761-a6d6d680219c')
  AND e.encounter_datetime >= ':startDate'
  AND e.encounter_datetime <= ':endDate'
  AND e.voided = 0;

SELECT 'lab', COUNT(e.encounter_id)
FROM encounter e
         INNER JOIN encounter_type et ON e.encounter_type = et.encounter_type_id
WHERE et.uuid IN ('cbf01392-ca29-11e9-a32f-2a2ae2dbcce4')
  AND e.encounter_datetime >= ':startDate'
  AND e.encounter_datetime <= ':endDate'
  AND e.voided = 0;
